titles.title: To amend the Magnuson Fishery Conservation and Management Act to establish additional prohibitions against removing, damaging, tampering with, or moving fishing gear and fish, including gear and fish from aquaculture operations in the exclusive economic zone.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife and Oceans.

bill.summary: 4/6/1995--Introduced. Amends the Magnuson Fishery Conservation and Management Act to modify the list of unlawful and criminal acts (concerning stealing, removing, damaging, and tampering with fishing gear and fish in that gear), adding references to attempting to commit certain of such acts and references to aquaculture operations in the exclusive economic zone.
